description: I co founded the startup sharacar.com and developped and deployed the whole API with Node.JS (express & mongoDB), I also worked on the front-end with ReactJS.
I helped create the website hellohelloproduction.com, it is now in standby because the very busy schedule of "hello hello productions" founders.

QHSE & Technical Department: QHSE follow-up of the Myanmar subsidiary.
Communication Department: review/analysis of group's website and social network
Sourcing Department: review and formatting of candidates' CVs.
